snippet: Many owners worry that they will lose potential business or alienate clients, or that the business will not be able to handle a crisis if they take some time off.
abstract: Many small business owners worry that they will lose potential business or alienate clients, or that the business will not be able to handle a crisis if they take some time off; tips are offered from company owners who managed to get away on vacation.
